school: PARALA MAHARAJA ENGINEERING COLLEGE, BERHAMPUR, ODISHA
university: Biju Pattnaik University of Technology (BPUT), Odisha
desc: I completed my B.Tech in Electrical Engineering at Parala Maharaja Engineering College (PMEC), Berhampur, Odisha with a CGPA of 8.47. The program provided a solid foundation in electrical systems, circuit design, and power systems. Through a blend of theoretical coursework and hands-on projects, I developed strong skills in designing and analyzing electrical circuits, preparing me for challenges in the field.

school: ORISSA SCHOOL OF MINING ENGINEERING, KEONJHAR, ODISHA
university: State Council for Technical Education & Vocational Training (SCTE & VT), ODISHA
desc: I completed a Diploma in Electrical Engineering at Orissa School of Mining Engineering (OSME), Keonjhar with a percentage of 70.91%. The program focused on fundamental electrical concepts, including circuit design, power systems, and maintenance. It offered practical skills and technical training essential for working effectively in the electrical engineering field.

school: M.P.C. HIGH SCHOOL, BETNOTI, MAYURBHANJ, ODISHA
desc: I completed my Class 10th education at M.P.C. High School, Betnoti, Mayurbhanj, Odisha. The curriculum provided a strong foundation in core subjects, preparing me for higher education with a focus on critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
